name: MTLVertexAttributeDescriptor
desc: An object that determines how to store attribute data in memory and map it to the arguments of a vertex function.

items.name: var format: MTLVertexFormat
items.desc: The format of the vertex attribute.

items.name: var offset: Int
items.desc: The location of an attribute in vertex data, determined by the byte offset from the start of the vertex data.

items.name: var bufferIndex: Int
items.desc: The index in the argument table for the associated vertex buffer.

items.name: enum MTLVertexFormat
items.desc: Values that specify the organization of function vertex data.
